About

Hello

Mike obtained a Master’s Degree in Studio/Jazz Guitar Performance from the University of Southern California(USC), where he studied under Bruce Forman, Bob Mintzer, and others.

About

Charles obtained a Master’s Degree in Jazz Guitar Performance and a music teacher certificate from Georgia State University.
